content: अदर्शनं {@--1@} Not seeing, non-vision; absence, not being seen; तमाहितौत्सुक्यमदर्शनेन <ls>R. 2. 73</ls>; अंतर्धौ येनादर्शनमिच्छति <ls>P. I. 4. 28</ls> the person whose sight one wishes to avoid; °नं गतः <ls>Pt. 2</ls>; °नीभूतः <ls>Pt. 1</ls> become invisible; अस्य °नं गत्वा <ls>Pt. 2</ls> going out of his sight, beyond the reach of vision; सा चात्यंतमदर्शनं नयनयोर्याता <ls>V. 4. 2</ls> lost to view, become invisible. {@--2@} Neglect, or failure to see; ब्राह्मणादर्शनेन च <ls>Ms. 10. 43.</ls> {@--3@} (Gram.) Disappearance, elision, omission; अदर्शनं लोपः <ls>P. I. 1. 60.</ls>
